Module Robotinterface
Package robotinterface.manipulator

Class Joint

java.lang.Object
robotinterface.manipulator.Joint
public class Joint
extends java.lang.Object
A reference to the manipulators joint (servo or linear motor). In contrast to Servo or LinearMotor it is only contains constants of the respective joint and does not provide the capability to modify the motor or ask for the motor's state. This interface is mainly used to put the kinematic representations (e.g. Jacobian) into a context.

      public double minValue
      Minimum joint parameter, e.g. Servo.getMinFlexibleAngle() or LinearMotor.getMinFlexibleLength().

    • maxValue

      public double maxValue
      Maximum joint parameter, e.g. Servo.getMaxFlexibleAngle() or LinearMotor.getMaxFlexibleLength().

    • minSpeed

      public double minSpeed
      Minimum joint speed, e.g. Motor.getMinFlexibleSpeed() or Motor.getMinFlexibleSpeed(). It may be Double.NaN if the joint does not support flexible speed.

    • maxSpeed

      public double maxSpeed
      Maximum joint speed, e.g. Motor.getMaxFlexibleSpeed() or Motor.getMaxFlexibleSpeed(). It may be Double.NaN if the joint does not support flexible speed.

      Description of the joint.
